title: Diamond 5 ADC LFT
body:
Ign: fwuzzy
Rank: Dia 5 35 lp
I play a lot of picks well and play all ads comfortably. I'm available a lot and I have a Mic.

Add me in game to chat more

replies.body: Do you use scripts / do you have smurf accounts?
No scripts and yes I have a couple of smurfs which I don't play on much
